availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John T. Trent (Fulton County, Kentucky, county court clerk)

body.p: Fulton County, Kentucky, county court clerk. Tennessee native. Filed a marriage bond to Mary Ann Martin Trent in Hickman, Kentucky, on March 5, 1853. Father of Eudoniah Trent and Frank Trent. County court clerk in Hickman in 1858. County court clerk in Hickman in 1860. County court clerk in Fulton County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fulton County, Hickman, p. 512.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War) NARA RG 110, Fulton County, KY, June 1863, p. 18.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994034, Fulton County Marriages, p. 20
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994034, Fulton County Marriages, p. 253.
